amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to require the Comptroller of the United States to provide recommendations to improve the capacity and preparedness of the Corp of Engineers workforce.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Krishnamoorthi.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
